remarks: An open ball in the complex numbers is simply connected.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
statement:
blscon.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
blscon.s $e |- S = ( P ( ball ` ( abs o. - ) ) R ) $.
blscon.k $e |- K = ( J |`t S ) $.
blscon $p |- ( ( P e. CC /\ R e. RR* ) -> K e. SCon ) $.
